title: Julia语言与统计
text:
Julia： 面向未来的技术型编程语言 
Julia 语言的一些常见描述：
 Walks like Python, runs like C. Come for the Syntax, Stay for the Speed.  - Nature A Programming Language to Heal the Planet Together  - Alan Edlman The Technical Programming Language of the Future  - Douglas Bates 要了解更多 Julia 语言本身的一般知识， 请参看 Julia 语言  官方文档 。 
            本站由  Julia 语言   生成.

title: 软件安装
开课历史
text: 本课程目前的开设学期为2023年春季。

title: 密码匹配
text: A Pluto.jl notebook v0.19.25 frontmatter chapter 2 section 1 order 12 title "密码匹配" layout "layout.jlhtml" tags "lecture", "CH02" description "" using Markdown using InteractiveUtils using CairoMakie using Random typeof Float64 function path rng, α n 500 \alpha tab x, y 0.0, 0.0 xDat, yDat Float64 , Float64 for in 1 n flip rand rng, 1 4 if flip 1 x 1 elseif flip 2 y 1 elseif flip 3 x 2 α rand rng elseif flip 4 y 2 α rand rng end push xDat, x push yDat, y end return xDat yDat end αs 0.2, 0.21, 0.22 fig Figure ax1 Axis fig 1, 1 ax2 Axis fig 1, 2 lines ax1, path MersenneTwister 27 , αs 1 , color blue lines ax1, path MersenneTwister 27 , αs 2 , color red lines ax1, path MersenneTwister 27 , αs 3 , color green rng MersenneTwister 27 lines ax2, path rng, αs 1 , color blue lines ax2, path rng, αs 2 , color red lines ax2, path rng, αs 3 , color green fig md""" 随机试验 """ faces 1 6 res iseven i j for i in faces, j in faces sum res length res ╠═╡ N 10^5 ╠═╡ sss sum iseven rand faces rand faces for in 1 N N ress sss for in 1 10^3 hist ress, bins 50 md""" 密码匹配 """ 10 ^ 8 62^8 i Ref 0 for x, y in zip "3xyZu4vN", "35xyZ4vN" x y && println x i 1 end i typeof x for x in "A", 'A' 62^8 61^8 62^8 possibleChars 'a' 'z' 'A' 'Z' '0' '9' vs , 'a' 'z' , 'a' 'z', , 'a' 'z' typeof possibleChars correctPassword "3xyZu4vN" N 10^5 passLength length correctPassword numMatch loginPassword sum loginPassword i correctPassword i for i in 1 passLength numMatch "35xyZ4vN" String rand possibleChars, passLength String Type vs string funciton passwords String rand possibleChars, passLength for in 1 10^7 sum numMatch p 1 for p in passwords 10^7

title: 网络路径
text: A Pluto.jl notebook v0.19.25 frontmatter chapter 2 section 2 order 13 title "网络路径" layout "layout.jlhtml" tags "lecture", "CH02" description "" using Markdown using InteractiveUtils using CairoMakie using Random using Combinatorics permutations using Statistics mean 0 向东； 1 向北 function isUpperLattice0 v for i in 1 length v sum v 1 i i 2 ? continue return false condition ? TRUE FALSE end return true end isUpperLattice v all sum v 1 i i 2 for i in 1 length v v let Random.seed 1 rand 0, 1 , 20 3 end end isUpperLattice0 v isUpperLattice v n, N 5, 10^5 pm permutations zeros Int64, n ones Int64, n collect pm reduce , 1 10 doc permutations Ω unique permutations zeros Int64, n ones Int64, n typeof Ω length Ω \Omega tab 1 n 1 isUpperLattice. Ω mean isUpperLattice. Ω A Ω isUpperLattice. Ω length A length Ω function randomWalkPath n x, y, path 0, 0, Int64 while x n && y n rand .5 ? x 1, push path, 0 y 1, push path, 1 end append path, x n ? zeros Int64, n x ones Int64, n y return path end let Random.seed 1 pA modelIItest sum isUpperLattice randomWalkPath n for in 1 N N end function CreateData v x, y 0, 0 graphX, graphY x , y for i in v i 0 ? x 1 y 1 push graphX, x , push graphY, y end return graphX graphY end upper CreateData A 4 lower CreateData setdiff Ω, A 10 fig Figure ax Axis fig 1,1 , xlabel L"East \rightarrow", ylabel L"North \rightarrow" lines ax, 0, n , 0, n , color black lines ax, upper, label "对角线之上" lines ax, lower, label "对角线之下" axislegend ax, position lt fig

title: 集合简介
text: A Pluto.jl notebook v0.19.25 frontmatter chapter 2 section 3 order 14 title "集合简介" layout "layout.jlhtml" tags "lecture", "CH02" description "" using Markdown using InteractiveUtils using StatsBase sample using Statistics mean using Random md""" `Julia` 中的集合 """ A1, B1, Ω1 Set 2, 7, 2, 3 , Set 1 6 , Set 1 10 doc Set String vs string union A1, B1 intersect A1, B1 交集 setdiff B1, A1 setdiff Ω1, B1 symdiff B1, A1 setdiff union A1, B1 , intersect A1, B1 in 1, B1 1 ∈ B1 \in tab issubset A1, Ω1 A1 ⊆ Ω1 \subset vs \subseteq Ω1 ⊆ Ω1 \Omega tab Ω1 ⊂ Ω1 false md""" 概率的合集 """ Ω 'a' 'z' A Set 'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u' C Set 'a', 'b', 'c' B Set 'x', 'y', 'z' intersect A, C intersect A, B N, n 10^5, 10^2 Est1 let Random.seed 1 sum rand Ω ∈ union A, B for in 1 N N end mcEst1 let Random.seed 1 mean Est1 for in 1 n end doc sample Est2 let Random.seed 1 sum rand Ω ∈ A || rand Ω ∈ B for in 1 N N sum ω rand Ω ω ∈ A || ω ∈ B for in 1 N N end mcEst2 let Random.seed 1 mean Est2 for in 1 n end

title: 容斥原理
text: A Pluto.jl notebook v0.19.26 frontmatter chapter 2 section 4 order 15 title "容斥原理" layout "layout.jlhtml" tags "lecture", "CH02" description "" using Markdown using InteractiveUtils using Combinatorics factorial, permutations using Random function bruteSetsProbabilityAllMiss n Ω permutations 1 n notmatch sum om . 1 n 0 for om in Ω notmatch any om . 1 n for om in Ω return sum notmatch length Ω end omega collect permutations 1 5 om omega end 4 collect 1 5 sum om . 1 5 0 dot . notmatch sum om . 1 5 0 for om in omega sum notmatch length omega omega notmatch bruteSetsProbabilityAllMiss 7 formulaCalcAllMiss n sum 1 ^k factorial k for k in 0 n formulaCalcAllMiss 7 Random.shuffle collect 1 5 function mcAllMiss n, N 10^6 function cardsStuffer cards Random.shuffle collect 1 n return any cards . 1 n 注意： ！ 的使用 end data cardsStuffer for in 1 N return sum data N end let Random.seed 1 mcAllMiss 7 end

title: 函数定义
text: A Pluto.jl notebook v0.19.25 frontmatter chapter 1 section 1 order 7 title "函数定义" layout "layout.jlhtml" tags "lecture", "CH01" description "" using Markdown using InteractiveUtils m rand 10, 10 md""" control m 当前cell为文字输入 \frac \alpha \beta \times \Gamma """ 世界 "world", "地球" println "你好 世界" for indx, val in enumerate 世界 println indx println val println " " end x^4 for x in 1 10 x^4 y^4 for x in 1 10 for y in 1 5 x^4 y^4 for x in 1 10, y in 1 5 x^4 y^4 z^3 for x in 1 10, y in 1 5, z in 1 4 X reshape 1 25, 5, x ^ 2 for x in X map x x^2, X map X do x x^2 end x x^2 f1 x x^2 f1 2 x x^2 2 function f2 x return x^2 end f2 2 X .^ 2 dot syntax

title: 冒泡顺序
text: A Pluto.jl notebook v0.19.25 frontmatter chapter 1 section 2 order 8 title "冒泡顺序" layout "layout.jlhtml" tags "lecture", "CH01" description "" using Markdown using InteractiveUtils md""" ctrl m 把当前cell变成markdown ctrl enter 新的cell （mac：commant enter） shift enter 运行当前cell shift tab： 代码缩进 contrl（command） 把当前cell中的代码注释掉 \frac \alpha \beta 函数定义方式 `x f x ` """ using BenchmarkTools ╠═╡ z collect 1 10 ╠═╡ x x^2 z dot syntax doc map map z do x y x^2 y 100 end map x y x^2 y 100 , z f x y x^2 return y 100 map f, z function ff x return y x^2 y 100 end map ff, z ff 4 ff z ff. z md""" 运行速度问题 """ begin let vs begin n, a 100 000, 2.78 x, y rand n , rand n end z typeof z z1 Vector Float64 undef, length x time for i in 1 n temp a x i y i push z, temp 所有带叹号的函数都存在其某个参数会被改变的情况。 end z function axpy1 a, x, y z for i in 1 n temp a x i y i push z, temp 所有带叹号的函数都存在其某个参数会被改变的情况。 end end benchmark axpy1 a, x, y function axpy2 a, x, y z Vector Float64 undef, length x for i in 1 n temp a x i y i push z, temp 所有带叹号的函数都存在其某个参数会被改变的情况。 end end benchmark axpy2 a, x, y md""" 冒泡顺序 """ function bubbleSort a n length a for i in 1 n 1 for j in 1 n i if a j a j 1 a j , a j 1 a j 1 , a j end end end return a end data rand 1 1000, 10^4 time bubbleSort data time sort data

title: 马科夫链
text: A Pluto.jl notebook v0.19.25 frontmatter chapter 1 section 3 order 9 title "马科夫链" layout "layout.jlhtml" tags "lecture", "CH01" description "" using Markdown using InteractiveUtils md""" 多项式的根 """ using Roots find zeros f x 10x^2 3x 1 f 10 find zeros f, 10, 10 md""" 马科夫链 """ P 0.5 0.4 0.1 0.3 0.2 0.5 0.5 0.3 0.2 P1 P' typeof P InitialState 1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1 InitialState P^100 A rand 4, 4 reshape 1 16, 4, 4 A 2, 2 A 2, 2 P 1, P 1, 2 P^10 1, using LinearAlgebra eigvecs P' eigvals P' md""" 蒙特卡洛模拟 """ md""" `x 1` 等价于 `x x 1` """ using StatsBase sample, weights sample 1 3 P 1, ss sample 1 3, weights P 1, for in 1 10^6 length ss ss . x 10^6 for x in 1 3 rand "x", "y", "z" zeros Int64, 3 P begin state Ref 1 N 10^6 numInState zeros Int64, 3 for in 1 N numInState state 1 state sample 1 3, weights P state , end end P^100 1, numInState . 10^6

title: 做图初步
text: A Pluto.jl notebook v0.19.25 frontmatter chapter 1 section 4 order 10 title "做图初步" layout "layout.jlhtml" tags "lecture", "CH01" description "" using Markdown using InteractiveUtils md""" 做图初步 """ using CairoMakie let using Makie FNs normpath joinpath Base.find package "Makie" , "..", "..","docs", "examples", "plotting functions" FLs " first split fn, "." , " for fn in readdir FNs print string FLs... end md""" 每一个函数都有一个带叹号` `的版本 """ doc lines f x, y x^2 y^2 f0 x f x, 0 f2 x f x, 2 x1 5 0.1 5 typeof x1 x2 collect x1 typeof x2 xVals, yVals 5 0.1 5, 5 0.1 5 z0 f x, y for y in yVals for x in xVals x, y for y in 1 5, x in 6 10 z f x, y for y in yVals, x in xVals vec z z0 M z 1 10, 1 10 lines z0 1 100 f0. xVals fig Figure resolution 1000, 500 ax1 Axis fig 1, 1 , title "直线图", xlabel "x值", ylabel L"f x, \cdot " ax2 Axis3 fig 1, 2 , xlabel "x", ylabel "y", zlabel L"f x, y " ax3 Axis fig 1, 3 1, 1 , xlabel "x", ylabel "y" lines ax1, xVals, f0. xVals , label L"f x, 0 " lines ax1, xVals, f2. xVals , label L"f x, 2 " axislegend ax1, position ct surface ax2, xVals, yVals, z hm heatmap ax3, M Colorbar fig 1, 3 2, 1 , hm tellwidth false, vertical false fig doc Colorbar md""" 多重派发 """ md""" 基于多重派发，Julia语言中有 StatsAPI 和 DataAPI 等包 """ function hailLength end function hL x T where T Number return "春去花还在" end function hL x Int return "远看山有色" end function hL x Float64 return "近听水无声" end hL 2.0 hL 2 hL π π \pi tab π isa Int 2 isa Int 2.0 isa Float64 md""" 希尔顿序列 """

title: 希尔顿序列和动图
text: A Pluto.jl notebook v0.19.25 frontmatter chapter 1 section 5 order 11 title "希尔顿序列和动图" layout "layout.jlhtml" tags "lecture", "CH01" description "" using Markdown using InteractiveUtils using PlutoUI TableOfContents title "目录", aside true md""" 希尔顿序列 """ using StatsBase using CairoMakie 352 318 methods 2 3 2.0 3 "你好, " i " " for i in "亚洲", "欧洲", "美洲" function hailLength end doc iseven md""" 判断x的真假，如果`x`为真， 返回`y`， 如果`x`为假， 返回`z` x ? y z """ 2.0 2 1 function hailLength x Int n 0 while x 1 x iseven x ? Int x 2 Int 3x 1 x % 2 0 n 1 n n 1 end return n end time lengths hailLength x for x in 2 10^7 xx x1 2 , x2 2, , x3 2, 3 x, typeof x for x in xx hist lengths, bins 1000, normalization pdf, axis limits 0, 500 , nothing , xlabel "序列长度", ylabel "密度" md""" 动图 """ md""" e^ ix \cos x i \sin x 当 x \pi 时 e^ i\pi 1 0 """ n 16 vertices 1 n complexPts exp 2π im k n for k in 1 n coords real p , imag p for p in complexPts edges Vector Vector Int typeof edges for v in vertices, u in v 1 n push edges, v, u end edges coords edges 2 fig Figure ax Axis fig 1, 1 scatter ax, coords videoname joinpath DIR , "test.mp4" doc record record fig, videoname do io for edge in edges lines ax, coords edge recordframe io end end fig

title: 光栅图
text: A Pluto.jl notebook v0.19.25 frontmatter chapter 1 section 6 order 11 title "光栅图" layout "layout.jlhtml" tags "lecture", "CH01" description "" using Markdown using InteractiveUtils using PlutoUI TableOfContents title "目录" using Images using CairoMakie using Statistics mean md""" 光栅图 """ imgdir joinpath DIR , "stars.png" img load imgdir size img propertynames img 1 points img 191 193, 167 169 192, 168 red. points blue. points green. points gImg red. img 0.299 green. img 0.587 blue. img 0.114 findmax gImg CarIdx last findmax gImg propertynames propertynames CarIdx typeof CarIdx typeof CarIdx.I xx rand 10, 20 size xx size xx, 1 size xx, 2 function boxBlur image, x, y, d total Float64 for xi in maximum x d, 1 minimum x d, size image, 1 for yi in maximum y d, 1 minimum y d, size image, 2 push total, image xi, yi end end return mean total end blurImg boxBlur gImg, x, y, 2 for x in 1 size gImg, 1 , y in 1 size gImg, 2 fig Figure resolution 1000, 500 ax1 CairoMakie.Axis fig 1, 1 ax2 CairoMakie.Axis fig 1, 2 heatmap ax1, gImg scatter ax1, last findmax gImg .I, markersize 60, strokecolor red, strokewidth 4, color white, 0 heatmap ax2, blurImg scatter ax2, last findmax blurImg .I, markersize 60, strokecolor red, strokewidth 4, color white, 0 fig

title: 随机数
text: A Pluto.jl notebook v0.19.25 frontmatter chapter 1 section 7 order 12 title "随机数" layout "layout.jlhtml" tags "lecture", "CH01" description "" using Markdown using InteractiveUtils using PlutoUI TableOfContents title "目录", aside false md""" 随机数 """ using Random using CairoMakie using StatsBase norm begin Random.seed 1975 rand for in 1 3 end md""" 蒙特卡洛模拟估计圆周率 """ N 10^6 hist rand N , bins 50 data1 rand , rand for in 1 N typeof data1 indata filter x norm x 1, data1 norm 模 outdata filter x norm x 1, data1 norm 模 length indata N 4 first. indata scatter first. indata , last. indata , color blue, markersize 0.7 scatter first. outdata , last. outdata , color red, markersize 0.7 current figure doc norm md""" 随机数产生器 """ a, c, m 69069, 1, 2^32 next x a x c % m 线性同余器， 伪随机数产生方法 data2 Array Float64, 1 undef, N x Ref 808 for i in 1 N data2 i x m x next x end data2 hist data2 scatter data2 1 3000 using Distributions hist randn N , bins 50 rng MersenneTwister 3 String rand rng, 'a' 'z', 6 ... randstring rng, 'a' 'z', 6 randperm rng, 6 shuffle rng, "x", "y", "z"

title: 数据类型
text: A Pluto.jl notebook v0.19.25 frontmatter chapter 1 section 1 order 7 homework number 1 title "数据类型" layout "layout.jlhtml" tags "homework", "CH01" description "" using Markdown using InteractiveUtils using PlutoUI function TypeTree t Type, indent " " println string indent, t indent " " for st in subtypes t TypeTree st, indent end end TypeTree Number TypeTree AbstractArray begin using GraphRecipes using Plots default size 1000, 1000 plot AbstractArray, method tree, fontsize 10, nodeshape ellipse end begin code function mysum list out 0 for value in list out value end out end plot code, fontsize 12, shorten 0.01, axis buffer 0.15, nodeshape rect end
